lead_paragraph: Boys and Girls High School and Automotive High School, two of New York City’s lowest-performing schools, are part of a turnaround effort by the Education Department.

headline.print_headline: Principals Chosen for 2 Troubled Brooklyn High Schools
headline.main: Principals Chosen for 2 Troubled Brooklyn High Schools

snippet: Boys and Girls High School and Automotive High School, two of New York City’s lowest-performing schools, are part of a turnaround effort by the Education Department....
abstract: New York City Education Dept names Grecian Harrison as interim acting principal at Boys and Girls High School in Brooklyn and Kevin Bryant as master principal at Automotive High School in Brooklyn.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Boys and Girls High School (Brooklyn, NY)
